title: What is the best full concert available on YouTube? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here’s the thing. I don’t know what all full concerts are on YouTube. I don’t even know which ones I’ve seen, either in person or recorded, I might find if I were to go looking today. I am even less sure the scope of concerts that I’d absolutely love were I to see them. So, I can hardly answer definitively. This is Nirvana at the OK Hotel in Seattle. This would be an historic performance if it weren’t the first live performance of “Smells Like Teen Spirit”, but it is also that.

Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers - live in Gatorville 2006. Back in his home town, Gainsville, Fla. Home town audiences are unbeatable. The connection between Tom and his homeys is clear. eg Southern Accents. I still mourn his untimely passing. The best songwriter of the last forty years. RIP.
